projects.title: AI Product Requirements Document Generative Agent
projects.description: A generative AI agent that can generate product requirements documents based on user input and context.

projects.title: Pharmaceutical Device Training
projects.description: An interactive pharmaceutical training application featuring instructional video content and gamified skills practice for medical device delivery techniques.

projects.title: Medical Education CMS
projects.description: A medical education content management platform showcasing searchable research posters, publications, and presentations with category filtering.

projects.title: AR Anatomical Models
projects.description: An augmented reality platform displaying interactive 3D anatomical models with selectable brain, eye, and heart visualizations in a dark-themed interface.

projects.title: Neurology Quiz Game
projects.description: An engaging neurology knowledge quiz featuring colorful brain imagery, a leaderboard system, and timed challenges for rare disease education.

projects.title: AI Spelling and Typo Analysis Tool
projects.description: A text analysis visualization tool with image upload capabilities and word highlighting functionality for analyzing document content.

projects.title: Clinical Trial Dashboard
projects.description: A data visualization dashboard presenting global clinical trial statistics with an interactive network diagram connecting research locations and outcomes.

projects.title: Healthcare Resource Library
projects.description: A resource library featuring curated educational video content for healthcare professionals with elegant pink wave design elements and card-based layouts.

projects.title: Interactive KOL Video
projects.description: An interactive medical education video player with clickable pathways and overlaid icons for exploring randomized clinical trial interpretations in atopic dermatitis.

projects.title: Nurse Consultant Locator
projects.description: A clinical nurse consultant locator application featuring zip code search functionality with vibrant magenta design and map pin visualizations.

projects.title: Marketing Website
projects.description: A striking marketing website for Red Nucleus.

projects.title: Component Library Documentation
projects.description: A comprehensive component documentation system showcasing UI elements like accordions with code examples, props documentation, and implementation usage patterns.

projects.title: Clinical Trial Recruitment
projects.description: A clinical trial recruitment website featuring healthcare professional photography, teal branding, and prominent call-to-action buttons for participant engagement.

projects.title: CIDP Diagnostic Quiz
projects.description: An interactive diagnostic quiz challenging healthcare professionals to test their knowledge of CIDP differential diagnoses with neural pathway imagery.

projects.title: Medical Presentation Platform
projects.description: A platform to upload, view, and share PowerPoint presentations and PDF/Word documents among team members with feedback, comments, and table of contents features.

projects.title: Teams Learning Management
projects.description: A Microsoft Teams-style learning management application with facilitator and learner views, real-time participant tracking, and interactive session management.

projects.title: Alopecia Areata Quiz App
projects.description: An online webapp for testing the knowledge of patients and healthcare providers around Alopecia Areata with interactive card-based learning modules.

projects.title: Product Dashboard with AR
projects.description: A product information dashboard featuring video content, augmented reality experiences, and interactive 3D graphs for medical data visualization.

projects.title: Data Visualization Platform
projects.description: A platform for parsing XLSX files and generating dynamic graphs and charts to display common medical data tied to specific reference fields.

projects.title: Air Miles Rewards
projects.description: Created a Design Library of React.js components published on NPM with i18n translation, Server Side Rendering with NextJS, and 100% unit test coverage using best practices.

projects.title: Toronto Star Database
projects.description: Built an in-browser sortable, searchable database of over 30,150 records using React with compression and lazy-loading techniques for one of Canada's largest newspapers.

projects.title: Home Depot Checkout
projects.description: Led production releases for Home Depot Orange Pay and Save Credit Card, restructuring a React.js project for performance and maintainability across multiple payments projects.
